_header: Men should well ken that Satan
Subjects: Theodora, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Theodora in the Scottish Legendary — in short couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[M]Ene suld wele kene þat sathaneȝet finis nocht na neuer
                    fane…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& þe house sa gouernyt ayþat haly is he cowntit
                    to day
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.27-37.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth

             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.99-123.
